author: ehatcher
msg: Add requires of new classes for easier including

author: ehatcher
msg: Add SolrSource class, which simply iterates over all documents matching query and filter constraints to be returned.  This is suitable for use with a Mapper and the Indexer to pull documents (stored fields only) from one Solr instance to another.
